description: This file defines a base class 'InfraBase' for infrastructure resource objects, including properties and methods for managing infrastructure resource configurations, environment variables, workspace settings, and resource control flags.

classes.name: InfraBase
classes.description: A base class for infrastructure resource objects, providing common properties and methods for managing infrastructure configurations, environment variables, and workspace settings.

methods.name: get_group_name
methods.description: Returns the group name or the resource name if group is not set.

methods.name: workspace_root
methods.description: Property that returns the root path of the workspace from workspace settings.

methods.name: workspace_name
methods.description: Property that returns the workspace name from workspace settings.

methods.name: workspace_dir
methods.description: Property that returns the directory path of the workspace, caching the result for efficiency.

methods.name: get_env_file_data
methods.description: Reads and caches environment variables from a YAML file if not already cached.

methods.name: get_secret_file_data
methods.description: Reads and caches secret variables from a YAML file if not already cached.

methods.name: get_secret_from_file
methods.description: Retrieves a specific secret value from the secret file data.

methods.name: get_infra_resources
methods.description: Abstract method to return infrastructure resources; not implemented in this base class.

methods.name: set_aws_env_vars
methods.description: Sets AWS-related environment variables based on provided region or workspace settings.
